action.name: quit
action.description: Quit to menu.

action.name: pause
action.description: Pause the game.

action.name: cameraMoveLeft
action.description: Move the camera to the left (free camera mode).

action.name: cameraMoveRight
action.description: Move the camera to the right (free camera mode).

action.name: cameraMoveUp
action.description: Move the camera upwards (free camera mode).

action.name: cameraMoveDown
action.description: Move the camera downwards (free camera mode).

action.name: cameraMoveForward
action.description: Move the camera forward (free camera mode).

action.name: cameraMoveBackward
action.description: Move the camera backward (free camera mode).

action.name: cameraTurnLeft
action.description: Turn the camera to the left.

action.name: cameraTurnRight
action.description: Turn the camera to the right.

action.name: cameraTurnUp
action.description: Turn the camera upwards.

action.name: cameraTurnDown
action.description: Turn the camera downwards.

action.name: followNext
action.description: Follow next spacecraft.

action.name: followPrevious
action.description: Follow previous spacecraft.

action.name: changeView
action.description: Change view of currently followed spacecraft.

action.name: setManualControl
action.description: Switch the control of the currently followed spacecraft to manual.

action.name: changeFlightMode
action.description: Toggle the controlled spacecraft between free and compensated flight modes.

action.name: fire
action.description: Fire the weapons of the manually controlled spacecraft.

action.name: forward
action.description: Forward thrust (free mode) or increase speed (compensated mode).

action.name: reverse
action.description: Reverse thrust (free mode) or decrease speed (compensated mode).

action.name: resetSpeed
action.description: Reset speed to zero (compensated mode).

action.name: yawLeft
action.description: Turn spacecraft to the left.

action.name: yawRight
action.description: Turn spacecraft to the right.

action.name: pitchUp
action.description: Turn spacecraft upwards.

action.name: pitchDown
action.description: Turn spacecraft downwards.

action.name: rollLeft
action.description: Roll spacecraft to the left.

action.name: rollRight
action.description: Roll spacecraft to the right.

action.name: setAIControl
action.description: Switch the control of the currently followed spacecraft to AI.

action.name: stopAIShips
action.description: Delete the goals of AI controlled spacecrafts and make all of them stop.

action.name: toggleHitboxVisibility
action.description: Toggle the visibility of hitboxes.

action.name: cameraDecreaseFOV
action.description: Zoom in. (decrease field of view of current camera)

action.name: cameraIncreaseFOV
action.description: Zoom out. (increase field of view of current camera)
